messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] posting links on my blog
messages.msgSnippet: -=-This may be completely redundant and unnecessary to ask- but I wanted to make sure it was OK with you if I post links to your site on my blog. I ve read so
messages.messageBody:
-=-This may be completely redundant and unnecessary to ask- but I wanted to make sure it was OK with you if I post links to your site on my blog. I've read so many of your posts --Sandra especially-- and they are so spot on with what i want to say to people... -=-

Any public site can be linked to any other public site, no problem!

And you can quote what people write in public, but use quotes and credit them by name, and maybe link to the place where you read it.

A discussion like this one is less public. It's still pretty public. :-) But it's good to quote from REALLY unquestionably public places, like these:

http://sandradodd.com
http://joyfullyrejoycing.com
or other blogs you can find easily

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: posting links on my blog
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I m new to this yahoo group, and already find it quite rich! Thank you for providing this fountain. I have just begun my own blog about parenting,
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I'm new to this yahoo group, and already find it quite rich! Thank you for providing this "fountain."
I have just begun my own blog about parenting, homeschooling and unschooling and although I'm not "completely there" in the unschooling department- I'm heading in that direction... I'm writing the blog to define what I'm doing so at least the people around me who don't understand can look at some of my writings.. It's also a place to compile cool info, and ultimately I want it to be a support for people who may be interested in going in a more homeschooling or  unschooling direction.

This may be completely redundant and unnecessary to ask- but I wanted to make sure it was OK with you if I post links to your site on my blog. I've read so many of your posts --Sandra especially-- and they are so spot on with what i want to say to people... 

http://flyingkitesatnight.wordpress.com/


I've actually already started doing this, but I'll take it down if you prefer I didn't. I don't really know blog etiquette yet.

Thanks. Shauna
